amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), add the following new section: SEC.___. None of the funds made available by this Act may be used to propose, plan for, or execute a new or additional Base Realignment and Closure (BRAC) round.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit use of funds for BRAC.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Guinta amendment (A062) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A062) offered by Mr. Guinta.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Guinta amendment (A062) Agreed to by voice vote.
